0x94EB1FE4.name: GET_PED_COLLECTION_LOCAL_INDEX_FROM_DRAWABLE

params.name: drawableId
params.description: Global drawable ID. Same as set in [SET_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION](#\_0x262B14F48D29DE80). Global drawable ID points to drawables as if drawables from all collections for the given component are placed into one continuous array.

0x94EB1FE4.description: Gets local index inside a collection (which can be obtained using [GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME_FROM_DRAWABLE](#\_0xD6BBA48B)) for the given global drawable ID. The collection name and index are used in functions like [SET_PED_COLLECTION_COMPONENT_VARIATION](#\_0x88711BBA).

examples.code:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Top for mp_f_freemode_01. From female_freemode_beach collection under index 1.
-- Global index is 17 because there is 16 top variations in the base game collection that goes before the female_freemode_beach collection.
local name = GetPedDrawableCollectionName(ped, 11, 17)
local index = GetPedDrawableCollectionLocalIndex(ped, 11, 17)
-- Equivalent to SetPedComponentVariation(ped, 11, 17, 0, 0)
SetPedCollectionComponentVariation(ped, 11, name, index, 0, 0)

0x94EB1FE4.resultsDescription: Local index inside a collection that the given global drawable ID corresponds to. Returns -1 if Ped is not found or the global index is out of bounds.
